name: Paritee Design System D
description: Sophisticated hybrid design system combining classical minimal restraint with modern bold foundation

philosophy.approach: Classical minimal refinement on modern bold foundation
characteristics: Sophisticated dark mode with refined gray scales
Brand blues as primary color foundation
Subtle gradients and refined visual hierarchy
avoid: Extreme font weights and dramatic scaling
Poor contrast in dark mode contexts

cards.base: bg-slate-800/40 border border-slate-700/50 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-lg rounded-none
cards.hover: group hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-slate-900/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:border-slate-600/60

buttons.primary: bg-transparent border border-blue-600 text-blue-400 hover:bg-blue-600/10 hover:border-blue-500 rounded-full transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-slate-600 text-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-600/10 hover:border-slate-500 rounded-full transition-all duration-300
buttons.success: bg-transparent border border-emerald-600/60 text-emerald-400 hover:bg-emerald-600/10 hover:border-emerald-600/80 rounded-full transition-all duration-300
buttons.warning: bg-transparent border border-amber-600/60 text-amber-400 hover:bg-amber-600/10 hover:border-amber-600/80 rounded-full transition-all duration-300

gradients.text: bg-gradient-to-r from-white via-slate-100 to-blue-200 bg-clip-text text-transparent

layout.header: border-b border-slate-800 bg-slate-900/60 backdrop-blur-xl sticky top-0 z-50

mandatory: All cards must use rounded-none (no rounding)
All buttons must be fully rounded (rounded-full) and outlined (transparent with borders)
Never use ALL CAPS in headlines
Use current font family - no font changes allowed
typography: Use sentence case for all headlines and buttons
Maintain consistent line-height (leading-tight for headers, leading-relaxed for body)
Use refined hierarchy without extreme scaling
colors: Brand blues are primary colors - use prominently
Use sophisticated gray scale (slate-200 to slate-950)
Accent colors at 20% opacity for subtle highlights
High contrast text for accessibility in dark mode

examples.card_component: <Card className="bg-slate-800/40 border border-slate-700/50 backdrop-blur-sm shadow-lg rounded-none">
examples.button_primary: <Button className="bg-transparent border border-blue-600 text-blue-400 hover:bg-blue-600/10 hover:border-blue-500 rounded-full px-6 py-3 transition-all duration-300">
examples.heading: <h2 className="text-3xl font-semibold text-white mb-4">
